title: Adipose hormone may play role in obesity-related asthma

title_detail.value: Adipose hormone may play role in obesity-related asthma

summary: New research suggests a hormone released from fat tissue is critical in the development of obesity-related asthma and may be a target of future treatments for the disease.

summary_detail.value: New research suggests a hormone released from fat tissue is critical in the development of obesity-related asthma and may be a target of future treatments for the disease.
